title: Metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events for 2015
text:
Metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events for 2015 Metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events for 2015 Post to Facebook Metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events for 2015 Metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events for 2015  //on9news.tv/1RIOOl0   Join the Conversation To   Metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events for 2015 Denver Business Journal, news source 4:52 p.m. MDT October 14, 2015 13th Floor and Asylum haunted houses: open nightly through Nov. 1, last weekend Nov. 6-7. (Photo: Courtesy 13th Floor Entertainment Group) 
DENVER BUSINESS JOURNAL - What is it we like so much about Halloween? 
Is it the celebration of our own immortality — something we cannot possibly understand? 
Or maybe we just like to dress up and pretend we're something we're not to get that escape. 
Of course, there's plenty of people who do it for the candy. 
Whatever the reason, the Denver Business Journal has a list of a handful of events going on around Colorado that are sure to help you get all your spooky, candy-filled fun with a friend, loved one , heck, even the whole family. 
To see a slide show of metro Denver's 12 best Halloween events, go to http://bit.ly/1GHE7bR .
